Class ValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • net.proteusframework.core.lang.InternationalizedException
            • net.proteusframework.core.lang.ValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Notifiable

    public class ValidationException
extends InternationalizedException
implements Notifiable
    Exception indicates a validation error with optional notifications.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@venturetech.net)
    See Also:
